text: Pulluvila is a village between Kovalam and Poovar in Thiruvananthapuram district of Kerala state, India. It's hardly 7 KMs away from the proposed Vizhinjam Port. ==Administration== Pulluvila is part of Neyyattinkara Taluk in Thiruvananthapuram district. It comes under Karumkulam Panchayath. ==Access== Pulluvila is 27 km from Thiruvananthapuram and 10 km from Neyyattinkara. ==Post office== Pulluvila village has a post office and the pincode is 695526. ==References== Category:Villages in Thiruvananthapuram district
title: Pulluvila
